channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Avec -60 % sur cette batterie externe 20 000 mAh et 145 W dotée de 4 ports, Amazon fait une offre incontournable pour Noël
item.description: Amazon a mis en place un coupon en plus d'une promotion sur la Baseus EnerGeek GR11, une batterie externe performante qui passe ainsi de 79,99 euros à seulement 31,49 euros.

item.title: 9 smart home gifts that’ll please tech whizzes and novices alike
item.description: Still pondering over your Christmas shopping list? Here are nine smart home gifts to please everyone.

item.title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 ‘Thank You’ update adds new dungeon, boss battles, and a Photo Mode worthy of The Paintress
item.description: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 just got free DLC, and it's precisely what I've been looking for.

item.title: Notorious Russian cybercriminals return with new ransomware
item.description: But encrypted files can easily be decrypted because someone forgot about a hardcoded artifact.

item.title: The Best Permanent Outdoor Lights (2025): Govee, Eufy, Lepro
item.description: DIY permanent eave lights that attach to the exterior of your home are becoming more popular. But are they worth the effort (and cost)?

item.title: Don't get ripped off — here's how to build a blazing fast 8TB Thunderbolt 5 SSD for cheap
item.description: This Thunderbolt 5 enclosure and 8TB SSD combo delivers extreme speeds while saving hundreds of dollars compared to pricey portable drives.

item.title: Comparatif : quelles sont les meilleures liseuses électroniques pour Noël 2025 ?
item.description: Quelle est la meilleure liseuse, noir et blanc ou couleur, à choisir ? Entre les Kindle d'Amazon et les Kobo de la Fnac, mais aussi d'autres marque, voici nos recommandations des meilleures liseuses pour Noël.

item.title: You Have a Week to Claim Up to $7,500 From AT&T Data Breach Settlements
item.description: Two breaches impacted millions of former and current AT&T users, unveiling SSNs, texts, and more.

item.title: A presidential refresher on wireless terminology, courtesy of Trump Mobile
item.description: Where's the Trump Phone? We're going to keep talking about it every week. We've reached out, as usual, to ask about the Trump Phone's whereabouts. As usual, we're still waiting for a response. In the meantime, we're publishing a little reminder of some wireless tech terms. You know, in case you forgot. 6G? 4K? 3D? […]

item.title: Lululemon stock price gets a boost as CEO departs and buybacks rise. Is this the start of a turnaround?
item.description: After a rough year, the athleisure apparel brand just reported higher revenue and a leadership shakeup that appears to have investors pleased. Lululemon might just be entering a new—and improved—era.

item.title: Reddit argues it isn’t like other social platforms in case against Australia’s social media ban
item.description: Reddit, one of the world's largest social platforms, is arguing that it doesn't meet the definition of "social media platforms" as it seeks to overturn Australia's law banning children under 16 years of age from social media.

item.title: Investors still doubling down on AI in Taiwan despite 'bubble' fears
item.description: .TWII is up 22% this year to date in line with Nasdaq, but it has a better P/E ratio, easing fears of an AI bubble.

item.title: The Game Awards just blew my mind with the Star Wars: Fate of The Old Republic announcement
item.description: A new Star Wars game set during the Old Republic era is now in development at Arcnaut Studios from Knights of the Old Republic and Mass Effect trilogy director Casey Hudson.

item.title: Shein, Temu, AliExpress : les petits colis seront taxés de 3 euros en entrant dans l’Union européenne
item.description: À compter du 1er juillet prochain, les colis de faible valeur provenant de l’extérieur des frontières de l’Union européenne subiront un droit de douane de 3 euros. Les plateformes chinoises de commerce en ligne sont les premières visées.

item.title: Task scams are tricking thousands, costing jobseekers millions
item.description: Researchers found thousands of 'gamified job scams' tricking jobseekers.

item.title: Epic Games Store : une liste incroyable de 15 jeux gratuits pour Noël fuite
item.description: La traditionnelle distribution de jeux gratuits de fin d'année de l'Epic Games Store fait l'objet d'une fuite massive venue de Chine.

item.title: This Tetris-playing watch struggles with the one thing it should be great at
item.description: The Tetris: My Play Watch may look like an Apple Watch, but it eschews most of the functionality you'll typically find on a smartwatch to focus on two things: playing Tetris and celebrating the game through a UI that's thoroughly Tetris-themed. It's very good at making you want to play Alexey Pajitnov's iconic tetromino-stacking puzzler, […]

item.title: F1: The Movie now streaming on Apple TV following a long theatrical run
item.description: F1: The Movie, the cinematic love letter to Formula One and — quite possibly even more so — consumer products made by Apple, is finally available to stream on Apple TV if you’re a subscriber. It follows the sports thriller’s long theatrical run, during which it raked in more than $630 million globally, comfortably making it Apple’s most successful original film. Directed by Joseph Kosinski (Top Gun: Maverick, Tron: Legacy), F1: The Movie follows the washed-up former F1 prodigy Sonny Hayes (Brad Pitt), who is convinced by an old friend (Javier Bardem) to get back in the driver's seat and help r...

item.title: Measles outbreak in South Carolina comes as infections nationwide are already at their highest since 1992
item.description: With vaccination rates declining, new preliminary data from the CDC shows that 2025 is the worst year for measles cases in more than three decades. Measles infections in America have hit their highest numbers in 33 years. In 2025, cases have topped 1,900, and that number is expected to rise due to an ongoing outbreak in South Carolina.

item.title: Best Merino Wool T-Shirts (2025), Tried On and Tested
item.description: These merino wool T-shirts are the last shirt you’ll ever wear. I’m wearing one right now.

item.title: In 2025, AI and EVs gave the US an insatiable hunger for power
item.description: You may be surprised to learn electricity only accounts for 21 percent of the world’s energy consumption. Fossil fuels and the rest all play their part to make the world go around, but their role is likely to diminish no matter what happens. The International Energy Agency believes electricity’s share of global energy consumption is going to double in the next decade alone. You all know the causes: Electrification, EVs, data centers and AI mean the planet needs to dramatically increase its power generation, transmission and storage capacity. It’s a shame, then, that the world is nowhere near r...

item.title: If you’re fed up with data breaches, this new technology could finally help
item.description: It’s called zero-knowledge proof technology, and here’s how it works. Every few weeks, Americans get another letter in the mail that starts the same way: “We’re writing to inform you that your personal data has been exposed.” A retailer gets hacked. A hospital. A supermarket. A travel site. It never ends. Most of us feel like we’ve lost control over who has our information and how it’s being used. But a new kind of privacy technology, one that lets companies confirm what they need to know without ever seeing your personal details, may finally offer a way out of this mess....

item.title: Samsung Galaxy Buds 3 Pro : de 249 € à 95 € seulement, ces excellents écouteurs notés 9/10 sont le super deal du jour
item.description: Les Galaxy Buds 3 Pro de Samsung offrent une excellente prestation digne des meilleurs écouteurs du marché. Si ces derniers vous intéressent, c'est le bon moment de craquer : ils sont en promotion à 95 euros contre 249 euros de base.

item.title: Engadget Podcast: Why Netflix is the best worst option for Warner Bros.
item.description: Last week, Netflix surprised us all when it announced plans for an $82.7 billion acquisition of Warner Bros., a move that would fundamentally reshape the world of streaming video and Hollywood. But Paramount isn't giving up on WB — this week it launched a $108 billion hostile takeover effort. In this episode, we discuss why everyone is fighting for WB, and why Netflix may be the best worst option for the storied movie studio.Subscribe!iTunesSpotifyPocket CastsStitcherGoogle PodcastsTopicsWhat the Netflix bid for Warner Bros. means for at-home streamers and moviegoers – 1:55Disney characters ar...

item.title: Les menus Google sont devenus un labyrinthe : voici l’option qui va tout simplifier
item.description: Google semble enfin admettre que la gestion de nos comptes est devenue une usine à gaz. Pour simplifier la navigation, l'entreprise teste l'intégration d'un chatbot directement dans les réglages.

item.title: Currys have come through with the goods just in time for Christmas — save 10% on PS5 consoles and bundles
item.description: Black Friday might be over, but you can save 10% on PS5 consoles at Currys with this code.

item.title: YouTube made its video player easier to navigate on TVs
item.description: The YouTube watch screen has been given a new look on TVs. The redesign aims to provide a "more intuitive experience with easier navigation," according to YouTube's announcement, relocating the video title and several controls, and adding a new "Description" button to access creator information and other video features. I'm already seeing the update on […]...

item.title: Gen Z is leading a visual communication revolution. Here’s what leaders need to know
item.description: They grew up with stories, stickers, and swipes. Now they’re transforming how we communicate, collaborate, and create. There’s a generational shift happening in workplaces that goes far deeper than debates about RTO or perks and snacks. Gen Z—the cohort that learned to communicate through stories, stickers, and swipe culture—is fundamentally reimagining how work gets done. After analyzing data from 2,475 professionals across our latest research, I’m convinced they’re crafting the future of work....

item.title: Get 40 percent off MasterClass subscriptions for the holiday season
item.description:
If you want to learn a new skill in the new year or brush up on some skills you already have, MasterClass could be a good option for you. It's even more accessible now that the company is running a holiday promotion that knocks 40 percent off subscriptions. For the top-tier Premium plan, which includes offline mode and use on up to six devices, you'll pay $144 for the year instead of the usual $240. The entry-level plan, which supports just one device and doesn't offer offline viewing, is marked down to $72 from $120.
Over the past few years, MasterClass has grown to over 200 classes, sessio...

item.title: iOS 26 leak reveals new a AirTag is on the way – here are 4 upgrades to expect
item.description: A new report has revealed upcoming features in Apple’s AirTag 2, which could arrive in 2026.

item.title: The new chicken wars are here, and they’re bigger than Popeyes vs. Chick-fil-A
item.description: A surge of upstarts is reshaping the category with extreme spice, niche menus, and cult-brand energy. When Raising Cane’s recently opened its first-ever location in Meridian, Idaho, it wasn’t a particularly remarkable event for the restaurant chain. The fast-growing chicken purveyor also opened six other restaurants in five other states on the exact same day in November. It aims to open close to 100 new stores this year....

item.title: Move over, Megaman — Ace Combat 8: Wings of Theve was the best reveal at The Game Awards 2025
item.description: After seven long years, I can't believe Ace Combat 8: Wings of Theve is actually real.

item.title: The Pluribus apocalypse gets a little quieter
item.description: The theme of this week is isolation. That's always been a part of what makes Pluribus so unsettling, of course; in the show there are only a handful of human survivors left on Earth, while the rest of the population has turned into an interconnected hive mind, some 7 billion people strong. But watching Carol […]

item.title: India orders VPNs to block access to websites that unlawfully expose citizens' data
item.description: The MeitY request comes as a way to protect Indian citizens' personal data, but it could clash with how no-log VPN services operate. Here's all you need to know.

item.title: Arrêt de la 2G et 3G : le guide pour préparer votre smartphone
item.description: Avec l'arrêt progressif des réseaux 2G et 3G, les opérateurs vont réutiliser ces fréquences pour renforcer leurs réseaux 4G et 5G. Mais que se passe-t-il pour votre smartphone ? On fait le point.

item.title: Your tumble dryer costs £1.21 per load, but this setup costs just 14p – here's what you need
item.description: Making this change to your indoor clothes drying setup could halve drying time without adding extra moisture to the air.

item.title: Uranus, Neptune : une remise en question majeure de leur structure interne
item.description: Il y a presque 40 ans, au cours de la décennie 1980, la sonde Voyager 2 nous livrait des informations sur le champ magnétique et le champ de gravité d'Uranus et de Neptune. Elles nous avaient permis d'en déduire des modèles crédibles de l'intérieur de ces planètes. Mais la planétologue Ravit...

item.title: Un géant de l’IPTV pirate indien cesse ses activités
item.description: MKVCinemas, l’un des plus gros réseaux de streaming pirate spécialisés dans les films et séries indiens, vient d’être entièrement démantelé. En deux ans, le réseau a cumulé plus de 140 millions de visites.

item.title: Prime Video hits pause on its AI-powered recaps after viewers were told Fallout was set in the 1950s
item.description: Prime Video's new AI-powered recaps just made two big mistakes with its Fallout season one recap.

item.title: Fin des colis Shein, AliExpress et Temu à bas prix : une taxe de 3 euros arrive en juillet 2026
item.description: Vous avez l'habitude de commander des câbles à 1 euro ou des t-shirts à 4 euros sur AliExpress ? Profitez-en, car ça ne va pas durer. Les ministres européens de l'Économie ont tranché ce vendredi : une taxe forfaitaire de 3 euros s'appliquera sur tous les petits colis dès l'été 2026. L'objectif ? Calmer les ardeurs des géants chinois.

item.title: L’Asus VivoBook 15 avec Intel Core 5 est une excellente machine de travail à moins de 400 € après réduction
item.description: Avec sa configuration simple mais efficace, son grand écran et sa légèreté, l'Asus VivoBook 15 est un laptop idéal pour le travail en mobilité. Actuellement, Cdiscount le propose à 399,99 euros au lieu de 599,99 euros.

item.title: The strange triumph of Rosie the Robot
item.description: In 1962, ‘The Jetsons’ flopped. But the tech industry has never stopped trying to bring the show’s lovable and trusty robot maid to life. Hello again, and thank you for spending time with Fast Company’s Plugged In.
